EmailTemplate.name: Provider Agreement Expiring
EmailTemplate.subject: Efficiency Works Provider Agreement Expiring Soon!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name},
The Efficiency Works Service Provider agreement for {!01If4000001Goc5.Name} we have on file will expire in 10 days. Please use this link {!Site.Name} to review and sign the latest Service Provider Agreement. If you have questions regarding this, please contact Efficiency Works. You may also reply to this e-mail.
Regards
Efficiency Works Team
